name: gusplease
text: A comment left by gusplease was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by wharfrat, JimTS, tasteful, leftsaidtim, gormster, chivalress, equinn2006, antecen, NDCaesar, Magb, mystkmanat, ferdinand, sncether, miaou)

name: deimosrising
text:
"The Wine So Bad it Made the News" would be the best advertising slogan ever devised by man, machine, or god.

Strip should be a five, y'all jerks is tasteless.

name: mikebox
text: Especially because their current slogan is "Just you, me, and a bottle of Blue Nun"

name: flipper_the_dolphin_bitch
text: holy shit, I had no idea, i thought it was an achewood invention.

name: berami
text: The design of the site is utterly fitting for a wine that god-awful.

name: tasteful
text: i like how the frontpage talks about how well it's been selling because the only people that look at that website are stockholders and, uh, achewood readers

name: mirzabah
text: I just went to that link, and it actually says: Yust you, me and a bottle of Blue Nun.

name: nause
text: Oh man, Blue Nun.  Where can you even get that these days?

name: fishingblues
text:
My hometown is in Northeast PA and the State Stores there still sell it. btw, I feel a bit of a need to defend Blue Nun. It's not that bad! It's no Opus One but for a cheap, sweet wine it beats some ratty White Zin such like Gallo.

Another low budget, damn delicious wine is Smoking Loon Chardonnay

name: fidget
text: man i am sitting here about to open a bottle of Smoking Loon Chardonnay, wondering if it will be delicious.  Achewood is good for everything.

name: tekende
text: what a coincidence, I'm sitting here drinking a glass of Kool-Aid and cheap vodka and it is grand!

name: leftsaidtim
text: What you need is some fresca.

name: tekende
text: Don't ever say that again that is disgusting

name: radchillies
text:
dogg, ain't nothin' better than a bottle of 2-buck chuck.

All sippin chiraz out of a dixie cup

smokin a grape swisher

mild delusions of grandeur and class.

name: twntysevn27
text: You lost me at grape swisher.

name: tasteful
text: you had me at grape swisher.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: you had me.

name: miaou
text: you.

name: everything_is_a_hat
text: apparently, Here and Here

name: centipede_damascus
text: I have got to find me some Blue Nun sometime.

name: wharfrat
text: "oh yes hello?" how roast beef

name: epicurus
text: The cigarette (?) in the electrical outlet slays me.

name: shmuckeles
text: yeah, you gotta love the props reaction shot

name: yingkaixing
text: Achewood's excellent mis-en-scene is second only to the beautiful prose in building my appreciation for Onstad.

name: petro
text: You know a wine is bad when your local neighbourhood ghettomart has it on sale. Naturally at 2$ a bottle you jump and by six bottles. The sad thing is that the winery is trying to make Blue Nun more "up market." This makes me fear that that charming bistro down the street will offer me Nighttrain or Thunderbird with my meal.

name: chomopomomofo
text: Does anyone else have a thang for Boone's Farms?

name: euphemisms
text: i have spent many nights at campfire with a bottle of watermelon boone's farm wrapped in a hankerchief. it's a beautiful thing.

name: wilbur
text: So, how is life amongst the hobos?

name: arbys
text:
Alt text: "This strip was written to Toy Dolls Banjo Fight"

...I assume he means "The Devil Went Down to Scunthorpe"

name: overmedicated
text: I live in Scunthorpe. I don't think he's left yet.

name: rowboat
text: ugh....toy dolls....bad memories....so numerous and varied....i'll take yanni....the screams of fifty children as a school bus flies off a bridge....anything....

name: honesttom
text: I like the little background detail of Ray retreating beneath the covers. That "I don't want to hear any sound ever again" hangover sensation.

name: jaldor
text: Or maybe he was shitting the bed.

name: dasilodavi
text: This reminds me of Charles Shaw, the infamous "Two Buck Chuck."  The resulting hangover from that stuff is exactly how Beef describes it.

name: i_love_kate
text: It may be just the beard, but... I seriously think that there is something horrendously wrong with Beef's expression in the last two panels.

name: charchar
text: I feel the 'heh heh' adds a certain je ne sais quoi, an apologetic and somewhat self-depreactaing overtone to the shameful bouquet of Blue Nun.

name: snatch22
text: This may be a stupid question, but did Blue Nun ever make the news?

name: tekende
text: Coming up, it's Star Wars right here at home! Or, at least, this is really terrible.

name: tekende
text:
Shit.

" This wine," it should say.

name: mikeronomicon
text: Shit, they should refer to Manechevitz as the wine so bad it made the news. That stuff makes Night Train almost palatable.

name: puguglypress
text: That first panel is so funny. I love it when Onstad shows off, it looks like it would be in a McSweeney's strip or something
